
.. _env export_ref:

conda env export
=======================

.. raw:: html

   <PRE>
   <!-- Manpage converted by man2html 3.0.1 -->
   <B>CONDA(1)</B>                         User Commands                        <B>CONDA(1)</B>
   
   
   
   NAME
          conda - conda env export
   
   DESCRIPTION
          usage:  conda-env  export  [-h]  [-c CHANNEL] [--override-channels] [-n
          NAME]
   
                 [-f FILE] [--no-builds]
   
          Export a given environment
   
   OPTIONS
      optional arguments:
          -h, --help
                 Show this help message and exit.
   
          -c CHANNEL, --channel CHANNEL
                 Additional channel to include in the export
   
          --override-channels
                 Do not include .condarc channels
   
          -n NAME, --name NAME
                 name of environment (in envs dirs)
   
          -f FILE, --file FILE
   
          --no-builds
                 Remove build specification from dependencies
   
      examples:
                 conda env export conda env export --file SOME_FILE
   
   
   
   Continuum Analytics             September 2016                        <B>CONDA(1)</B>
   </PRE>
